title: description
Jason Derulo's Queen Bee: A weathered variant of the Queen Bee. As worn as Jason Derulo's teacher.

title: notes
Jason Derulo's Queen Bee: Gin, Curacao and a dash of show.

title: pairing
Jason Derulo's Queen Bee: Jason Derulo has it with a worn Benedictine and doughnut.

title: serving_suggestion
Jason Derulo's Queen Bee: Shake in iced cocktail shaker & strain. Drink to the passable sounds of In My Head.
